attributes.additional_details: The Driver CPC is another nail in the Haulage industrys coffin, It will result in lots of professional drivers giving up because they cannot afford another back handed tax. Having to pay to be told how to do what you've been doing for years is pointless,you dont even need to pass an exam to get it, just pay & attend, WHO ELSE HAS TO PAY EVERY 5 YEARS TO CARRY ON WORKING, it is unfair, not needed and needs scrapping now
